name: Super Furball
description: A rollicking action-platformer, inspired by the greats of the DOS and NES era. Explore 20 huge levels in 4 varied locations, full of cunning secrets and unique dangers, including 4 epic boss battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any system capable of hardware rendering. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 120 MB available space
